objects.name: Test malware in various execution environments
objects.description: Malware may perform differently on different platforms (computer vs handheld) and different operating systems ([http://www.ubuntu.com Ubuntu] vs [http://www.apple.com/osx/ OS X]), and versions ([http://windows.microsoft.com Windows] 7 vs 10) so malicious actors will test their malware in the environment(s) where they most expect it to be executed. (Citation: BypassMalwareDefense)

external_references.description: Morton Christiansen. (2010, May 7). Bypassing Malware Defenses. Retrieved March 9, 2017.
